caption.p: Emergence of human coronaviruses: As of July 12, 2020, seven CoVs are known to be human pathogens including the alpha-CoVs HCoVs-NL63 (1200-1500) and HCoVs-229E (1700-1800) and the beta-CoVs HCoVs-OC43 (1890), HCoVs-HKU1 (1950), severe acute respiratory syndrome-CoV (SARS-CoV) (2002), Middle East respiratory syndrome-CoV (MERS-CoV) (2012) and the novel SARS-CoV-2 (2019).
